readings.title: My future
readings.scene: 这段对话发生在教室内，老师询问学生们关于未来的职业理想。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: What do you want to be?
I want to be a pilot.
I want to fly a plane in the sky.

knowledgePoints: 核心职业名词：`pilot` (飞行员), `cook` (厨师/烹饪), `taxi driver` (出租车司机), `singer` (歌手), `lifeguard` (救生员), `teacher` (教师), `doctor` (医生)
核心动词与短语：`future` (将来), `want` (想要), `teach` (教), `save` (救), `become` (变成), `(be) good at` (擅长)
语音知识：掌握字母组合 `sk` 的发音，如 `desk` (书桌) 和 `mask` (面具)

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.content: What do you want to be, children?
dialogues.contentCn: 老师：孩子们，你们将来想做什么？

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: I want to be a pilot. I want to fly a plane in the sky.
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：我想成为一名飞行员。我想在天空中驾驶飞机。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: I want to be a doctor. I want to help people.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我想成为一名医生。我想帮助人们。

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.content: I want to be a teacher. I want to teach English in a school.
dialogues.contentCn: 艾丽丝：我想成为一名老师。我想在学校里教英语。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: I want to be a cook. I want to cook nice food.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：我想成为一名厨师。我想烹饪美味的食物。

readings.title: Froggy's new job
readings.scene: 这段文本描述了小青蛙寻找适合自己职业的过程。

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Froggy wants to be a pilot. He wants to fly a plane, but he is afraid of flying.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：小青蛙想成为一名飞行员。他想开飞机，但他害怕飞行。

dialogues.speaker: Froggy
dialogues.content: Help! Help! It's too high!
dialogues.contentCn: 小青蛙：救命！救命！这儿太高了！

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Froggy wants to be a singer, but he is not good at singing.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：小青蛙想成为一名歌手，但他并不擅长唱歌。

dialogues.speaker: Chick
dialogues.content: Help!
dialogues.contentCn: 小鸡：救命！

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: One day, a chick falls into the lake! A lifeguard jumps into the lake. Froggy jumps into the lake too. They save the chick.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：一天，一只小鸡掉进了湖里！一名救生员跳进了湖中。小青蛙也跳进了湖里。他们救了小鸡。

dialogues.speaker: Lifeguard
dialogues.content: You're good at swimming. Do you want to be a lifeguard?
dialogues.contentCn: 救生员：你很擅长游泳。你想成为一名救生员吗？

dialogues.speaker: Froggy
dialogues.content: Yes, I do!
dialogues.contentCn: 小青蛙：是的，我想！

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Froggy becomes a lifeguard. He likes his new job.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：小青蛙成为了一名救生员。他喜欢他的新工作。

readings.title: Going to school
readings.scene: 这段对话展示了 Jill 询问几位同学上学的交通方式。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: How do you come to school?
I come to school on foot.
Joe comes to school by bus.
I live far from our school.

knowledgePoints: 交通方式表达：`by bus` (乘公交), `by bike` (骑车), `by car` (乘私家车), `by underground` (乘地铁), `on foot` (步行)
核心动作短语：`walk to...` (步行去...), `take the bus/train` (乘公交/火车), `get off` (下车), `far from` (离...远)
地点名词：`station` (车站), `bus stop` (公交站), `primary school` (小学)
语音知识：掌握字母组合 `sp` 的发音，如 `wasp` (黄蜂) 和 `crisp` (薯片)

dialogues.speaker: Jill
dialogues.content: How do you come to school, Joe?
dialogues.contentCn: 吉尔：乔，你怎样来学校？

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: I come to school by bus. I live far from our school.
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：我乘公共汽车来。我住得离学校很远。

dialogues.speaker: Jill
dialogues.content: How do you come to school, Alice?
dialogues.contentCn: 吉尔：艾丽丝，你怎样来学校？

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.content: I come to school on foot. I live near school.
dialogues.contentCn: 艾丽丝：我步行来。我住得离学校近。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: I come to school on foot too. Alice and I walk to school together.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我也步行来。艾丽丝和我一起走路来学校。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: I come to school by bus.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：我乘公共汽车来学校。

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Ms Guo is a teacher. She walks to the underground station and takes the train.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：郭老师是一名老师。她步行到地铁站并乘坐地铁。

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Then she takes Bus No. 12 to Spring Street. She gets off at the bus stop and walks to her school.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：然后她乘坐12路公交车到春晓街。她在公交站下车，然后步行去学校。

readings.title: Ms Guo's journey to work
readings.scene: 这段短文描述了郭老师从家到学校的通勤路线。

keySentencePatterns.meaning: 搭乘火车。在英语中，take 也常用于乘坐交通工具
下车。对应“上车”为 get on，课本侧重下车地点的描述

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.content: Ms Guo is a teacher at Happy Primary School. She lives on Green Street.
dialogues.contentCn: 旁白：郭老师是幸福小学的老师。她住在绿街。

dialogues.speaker: Text
dialogues.content: There is an underground station near Ms Guo's home. Ms Guo walks to the station and takes the train.
dialogues.contentCn: 正文：郭老师家附近有一个地铁站。郭老师步行去车站并搭乘火车/地铁。

dialogues.speaker: Text
dialogues.content: She gets off the train at Park Street Station.
dialogues.contentCn: 正文：她在公园街站下车。

dialogues.speaker: Text
dialogues.content: Then she takes Bus No. 12 to Spring Street.
dialogues.contentCn: 正文：然后她搭乘12路公交车前往春街。

dialogues.speaker: Text
dialogues.content: After half an hour, she gets off at Spring Street Bus Stop. Then she walks to her school.
dialogues.contentCn: 正文：半小时后，她在春街公交站下车。然后她走去学校。

readings.title: My birthday
readings.scene: 这段对话发生在 Peter 和 Joe 之间，Peter 邀请 Joe 参加他的生日聚会。

keySentencePatterns.meaning: 在9月26日。注：日期使用“on + 序数词 + 月份”。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: What time does the party begin?
Can you bring some orange things to the party?
keySentencePatterns.meaning: 你能带一些橙色的东西来聚会吗？

knowledgePoints: 核心名词：`party` (聚会), `hat` (帽子), `thing` (东西), `favourite` (最喜欢的)
核心短语：`begin` (开始), `bring` (带来), `have fun` (尽情玩), `can't wait` (等不及了)
序数词：掌握从 `first` (第一) 到 `thirty-first` (第三十一) 的表达方式及缩写规律（如 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th...）
语音知识：掌握字母组合 `st` 的发音，如 `toast` (烤面包) 和 `postman` (邮递员)
文化知识：在中国，人们通常不会立刻打开礼物；而在西方国家，人们通常会当面打开礼物

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: Can you come to my birthday party, Joe?
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：乔，你能来参加我的生日聚会吗？

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: Sure. When's your birthday?
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：当然可以。你的生日是什么时候？

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: It's on 26th September.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：在9月26日。

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: What time does the party begin?
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：聚会几点开始？

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: It begins at two o'clock in the afternoon.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：下午两点开始。

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: OK.
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：好的。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: Can you bring some orange things to the party? It's an "orange party". Orange is my favourite colour.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：你能带一些橙色的东西来聚会吗？这是一个“橙色聚会”。橙色是我最喜欢的颜色。

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: An "orange party"? That sounds interesting. I can't wait!
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：一个“橙色聚会”？听起来很有趣。我等不及了！

readings.title: My birthday
readings.scene: 朋友们带着橙色的物品来到聚会现场。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: What orange things do you have?

knowledgePoints: 序数词。规律口诀：first, second, third 特殊记，fourth 开始加 `th`。注意 twelfth (第十二，基数词 twelve 结尾的 `ve` 变 `f` 再加 `th`)
长单词：thirteenth (第十三), twenty-first (第二十一)

dialogues.speaker: Children
dialogues.content: Happy birthday, Peter!
dialogues.contentCn: 孩子们：生日快乐，彼得！

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: Thank you! Welcome to my "orange party". What orange things do you have?
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：谢谢！欢迎来到我的“橙色聚会”。你们带了什么橙色的东西？

dialogues.speaker: Jill
dialogues.content: I have an orange hat.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉尔：我有一个橙色的帽子。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: I have an orange skirt.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我有一条橙色的裙子。

dialogues.speaker: Joe
dialogues.content: I have an orange T-shirt.
dialogues.contentCn: 乔：我有一件橙色的T恤。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: What do you have, Alice?
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：你带了什么，艾丽丝？

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.content: Look, Peter! I have an orange card for you.
dialogues.contentCn: 艾丽丝：看，彼得！我有一张给你的橙色卡片。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: Thank you so much. Look at the table. Here are some orange things for you. They're oranges, orange juice and an orange cake. Let's have some fun!
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：非常感谢。看桌子。这儿有一些给你们的橙色东西。它们是橙子、橙汁和橙色蛋糕。让我们尽情玩吧！

readings.title: Grandparents
readings.scene: 郭老师在课堂上询问学生们平时如何与祖父母互动，随后是玛丽和约翰与奶奶的一次购物约定。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: What do you usually do with your grandparents?
keySentencePatterns.meaning: 你通常和你的祖父母做什么？

keySentencePatterns.pattern: I usually play chess with my grandpa.

knowledgePoints: 频率副词排序：`always` (总是) > `usually` (通常) > `often` (经常) > `sometimes` (有时) > `never` (从不)
重点短语：`play chess` (下棋), `write emails` (写邮件), `visit them` (看望他们), `go shopping` (去购物), `far from` (离...远), `at the weekend` (在周末)
语音知识：掌握字母组合 `sh` 的发音，如 `dish` (盘子) 和 `wash` (洗)
文化常识：中国在10月或11月庆祝重阳节 (Double Ninth Festival)；美国在9月的某个周日庆祝祖父母节 (Grandparents' Day)

dialogues.speaker: Ms Guo
dialogues.content: What do you usually do with your grandparents?
dialogues.contentCn: 郭老师：你通常和你的祖父母一起做什么？

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.content: I usually play chess with my grandpa.
dialogues.contentCn: 艾丽丝：我通常和我爷爷下棋。

dialogues.speaker: Peter
dialogues.content: My grandparents live in the UK. I often write emails to them.
dialogues.contentCn: 彼得：我的祖父母住在英国。我经常给他们写电子邮件。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: My grandparents live far from my home. I often visit them at the weekend. We like going to the park together.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我的祖父母住得离我家很远。我经常在周末去看望他们。我们喜欢一起去公园。

dialogues.speaker: Ms Guo
dialogues.content: Do you play sport with your grandparents?
dialogues.contentCn: 郭老师：你会和你的祖父母一起做运动吗？

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: Yes. I sometimes play table tennis with them.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：是的。我有时和他们一起打乒乓球。

dialogues.speaker: Mary
dialogues.content: Hello, Grandma. This is Mary. Do you want to go shopping with John and me this Saturday?
dialogues.contentCn: 玛丽：喂，奶奶。我是玛丽。这周六你想和约翰还有我一起去购物吗？

dialogues.speaker: Grandma
dialogues.content: Yes, we can meet at the bus stop at twelve o'clock.
dialogues.contentCn: 奶奶：好的，我们可以在十二点整在公交车站见面。

dialogues.speaker: Mary
dialogues.content: Where's Grandma? It's twelve o'clock.
dialogues.contentCn: 玛丽：奶奶在哪儿？已经十二点整了。

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.content: Grandma is never late.
dialogues.contentCn: 约翰：奶奶从不迟到。

dialogues.speaker: Grandma
dialogues.content: Hello, Mary. Hello, John. Come with me!
dialogues.contentCn: 奶奶：你们好，玛丽。你好，约翰。跟我来吧！

readings.title: Friends
readings.scene: Kitty 正在介绍她的好朋友 Alice，并描述她们的性格、共同爱好以及经常一起做的事情。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: We sometimes help old people cross the street.
keySentencePatterns.meaning: 我们有时帮助老人穿过马路。

knowledgePoints: 核心形容词：`clever` (聪明的), `same` (相同的), `different` (不同的), `heavy` (重的), `bored` (无聊的), `easy` (容易的)
重点短语：`both` (两个都), `each other` (互相), `cross the street` (穿过马路), `carry heavy bags` (提重袋子), `make phone calls` (打电话)
语音知识：掌握字母组合 `dr` (dress) 和 `pr` (princess) 的发音

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: I'm Kitty. I have a friend. Her name's Alice. She's clever. We're in the same class.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我是吉蒂。我有一个朋友。她的名字叫艾丽丝。她很聪明。我们在同一个班级。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: We both like sport. I like playing table tennis and Alice likes playing volleyball.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我们两个都喜欢运动。我喜欢打乒乓球，艾丽丝喜欢打排球。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: We both love animals. I have a cat and Alice has a dog.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我们两个都喜爱动物。我有一只猫，艾丽丝有一只狗。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: We both like helping people. We sometimes help old people cross the street. We also help them carry heavy bags.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我们两个都喜欢帮助别人。我们有时帮助老人穿过马路。我们还帮他们提重袋子。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: We like each other. We're good friends.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我们喜欢彼此。我们是好朋友。

readings.title: Family life
readings.scene: 描述李老师（Mr Li）一家人在家里不同房间进行的日常活动，以及在“地球一小时”期间大家如何度过夜晚。

keySentencePatterns.pattern: Many people turn off their lights.

knowledgePoints: 现在进行时：掌握 `be + 动词ing` 结构，如 `doing` (正在做), `making` (正在制作), `washing` (正在洗), `cooking` (正在烹饪)
核心房间类词汇：`living room` (客厅), `bedroom` (卧室), `kitchen` (厨房), `bathroom` (浴室)
重点短语：`model plane` (飞机模型), `turn off` (关掉), `watch TV` (看电视), `tell a story` (讲故事), `at bedtime` (在就寝时间)
语音知识：掌握字母组合 `br` (bread) 和 `cr` (ice cream) 的发音

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: I'm in the living room. I'm doing my homework.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我在客厅。我正在做家庭作业。

dialogues.speaker: Ben
dialogues.content: I'm in my bedroom, Dad. I'm making a model plane.
dialogues.contentCn: 本：爸爸，我在我的卧室。我正在制作飞机模型。

dialogues.speaker: May
dialogues.content: I'm in the bathroom. I'm washing my hair.
dialogues.contentCn: 梅：我在浴室。我正在洗头发。

dialogues.speaker: Dad
dialogues.content: I'm in the kitchen. I'm cooking dinner. Come and help me, please.
dialogues.contentCn: 爸爸：我在厨房。我正在做晚饭。请来帮帮我。

dialogues.speaker: Reporter
dialogues.content: It's Earth Hour now. Many people turn off their lights.
dialogues.contentCn: 记者：现在是“地球一小时”。许多人关掉了他们的灯。

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.content: I usually watch TV with my parents in the evening, but now we're looking at the stars.
dialogues.contentCn: 艾丽丝：我通常在晚上和父母一起看电视，但现在我们正在看星星。

dialogues.speaker: Kitty
dialogues.content: My brother Ben and I usually read storybooks before bedtime, but now Grandma is telling us a story.
dialogues.contentCn: 吉蒂：我哥哥本和我通常在睡前读故事书，但现在奶奶正在给我们讲故事。

dialogues.speaker: Sally
dialogues.content: I usually do my homework at night, but now I'm playing word games with my family.
dialogues.contentCn: 萨莉：我通常在晚上做作业，但现在我正和家人一起玩单词游戏。
